para.text: The final step in this model is to assign the infiltration concentration to the cells in the middle of the top of the model. Open the object that specifies the UZF properties for those cells and set the infiltration concentration for the the solute to 1. Note that if more than one solute was being simulated, the infiltration concentration could be different for each of them.

image.title: Screen capture of the Object Properties dialog box showing the specification of the infiltration concentration for the unsaturated zone flow in the center of the top of the model.
image.caption: Screen capture of the Object Properties dialog box showing the specification of the infiltration concentration for the unsaturated zone flow in the center of the top of the model.
